name: Kenneth Zambrano
content: With over 8 years as a FullStack and Blockchain developer, kenneth creates intricate Dapps, robust microservices, and applications from the ground up.

name: Carlos Zambrano
content: Since 2016 into software systems and blockchain development. Solid fundamental of software architecture and consultancy.

name: Ivo Garofalo
content: Working with blockchain technology for over a decade, genuinely believer in the power of decentralization. Strong knowledge on smart contracts and decetralized solutions.

name: Gabriel Caro
content: Gabriel, a tech enthusiast and computer science specialist with +15 years of experience in server management and security, is deeply passionate about cryptography and artificial intelligence

name: Taha Dhailey
content: Blockchain Developer Engineer and Researcher having 8+ years of experience with a background in IT, Startups, and Management. Tech consultant for enterprises and mentor for new users and learners.
